page.title: 05Around Tesco's, Hollington
page.content: Before Tesco's was built the land was {fields and woodland.}It is now a busy area.First,{roads}were built from Hastings and from the A21.After this they started building{houses.}Nowthere are quite a lot of homes and they are still building.In 5 years the area has changed completely. Soon they will build a pub next to Tesco's,and the Council is talking about putting a Post Office there. We made out a{questionnaire}and found that: 1.More than half the shoppers lived in Hastings. 2.1 out of 10 travelled more than 15 miles to get there. 3.They nearly all came by car. 4.7 out of 10 said they used the restaurant sometimes. 5.4 out of 10 used the garage because the petrol is cheaper.
